00046 // These are defined as macros in the Windows headers and collide with some of our "proper" C++ definitions. Sorry, it
00047 // just ain't right to use global macros in C++. I #undef them. Include PikaScript.h before the Windows headers if you
00048 // need these macros (or push and pop their definitions before and after including this header with #pragma push_macro
00049 // and pop_macro).

00101 template<class C, class A0, class R> class bound_mem_fun_t : public std::unary_function<A0, R> {
00102         public:         bound_mem_fun_t(R (C::*m)(A0), C* o) : m(m), o(o) { }
00103         public:         R operator()(A0 a) const { return (o->*m)(a); }
00104         protected:      R (C::*m)(A0);
00105         protected:      C* o;
00106 };
00107 
00119 template<class C, class A0, class R> inline bound_mem_fun_t<C, A0, R> bound_mem_fun(R (C::*m)(A0), C* o) {
00120         return bound_mem_fun_t<C, A0, R>(m, o);
00121 }

00134 template<class S> class Exception : public std::exception {
00135         public:         Exception(const S& error) : error(error) { }                                                                                                                    
00136         public:         virtual S getError() const throw() { return error; }                                                                                                    
00137         public:         virtual const char *what() const throw() { return (converted = toStdString(error)).c_str(); }                   
00138         public:         virtual ~Exception() throw() { }                                                                                                                                                // (GCC requires explicit destructor with one that has throw().)
00139         protected:      S error;                                                                                                                                                                                                
00140         protected:      mutable std::string converted;                                                                                                                                                  
00141 };

00172 template<class S> class STLValue : public S {
00173

00176         public:         typedef S String;                                                                                                                                                                               
00177         public:         typedef typename S::value_type Char;

00179 
00180 
00181         public:         STLValue() { }                                                                                                                                                                                  
00182         public:         STLValue(double d) : S(doubleToString<S>(d)) { }                                                                                                                
00183         public:         STLValue(float f) : S(doubleToString<S>(f)) { }                                                                                                                 
00184         public:         STLValue(long i) : S(intToString<S, long>(i)) { }                                                                                                               
00185         public:         STLValue(ulong i) : S(intToString<S, ulong>(i)) { }                                                                                                             
00186         public:         STLValue(int i) : S(intToString<S, long>(i)) { }                                                                                                                
00187         public:         STLValue(uint i) : S(intToString<S, ulong>(i)) { }                                                                                                              
00188         public:         STLValue(bool b) : S(b ? S(STR("true")) : S(STR("false"))) { }                                                                                  
00189         public:         template<class T> STLValue(const T& s) : S(s) { }                                                                                                               
00190 
00191 
00192 
00193         public:         operator bool() const;                                                                                                                                                                  
00194         public:         operator long() const;                                                                                                                                                                  
00195         public:         operator double() const;                                                                                                                                                                
00196         public:         operator float() const { return float(double(*this)); }                                                                                                 
00197         public:         operator ulong() const { return ulong(long(*this)); }                                                                                                   
00198         public:         operator int() const { return int(long(*this)); }                                                                                                               
00199         public:         operator uint() const { return uint(int(*this)); }                                                                                                              
00200 
00201 
00202 
00203         public:         bool operator<(const STLValue& r) const;                                                                                                                                
00204         public:         bool operator==(const STLValue& r) const;                                                                                                                               
00205         public:         bool operator!=(const STLValue& r) const { return !(*this == r); }                                                                              
00206         public:         bool operator>(const STLValue& r) const { return r < (*this); }                                                                                 
00207         public:         bool operator<=(const STLValue& r) const { return !(r < (*this)); }                                                                             
00208         public:         bool operator>=(const STLValue& r) const { return !((*this) < r); }                                                                             
00209         public:         const STLValue operator[](const STLValue& i) const;                                                                                                             
00210 
00211 
00212 
00213         public:         bool isVoid() const { return S::empty(); }                                                                                                                              
00214

00217         public:         template<class T> bool operator<(const T& r) const { return operator<(STLValue(r)); }
00218         public:         template<class T> bool operator==(const T& r) const { return operator==(STLValue(r)); }
00219         public:         template<class T> bool operator!=(const T& r) const { return operator!=(STLValue(r)); }
00220         public:         template<class T> bool operator>(const T& r) const { return operator>(STLValue(r)); }
00221         public:         template<class T> bool operator<=(const T& r) const { return operator<=(STLValue(r)); }
00222         public:         template<class T> bool operator>=(const T& r) const { return operator>=(STLValue(r)); }
00223         public:         template<class T> const STLValue operator[](const T& i) const { return operator[](STLValue(i)); }

00228 enum Precedence {
00229         NO_TRACE = 0            
00230         , TRACE_ERROR = 1       
00231         , TRACE_CALL = 2        
00232         , TRACE_LOOP = 3        
00233         , STATEMENT = 4         
00234         , BODY = 5                      
00235         , ARGUMENT = 6          
00236         , BRACKETS = 7          
00237         , ASSIGN = 8            
00238         , LOGICAL_OR = 9        
00239         , LOGICAL_AND = 10      
00240         , BIT_OR = 11           
00241         , BIT_XOR = 12          
00242         , BIT_AND = 13          
00243         , EQUALITY = 14         
00244         , COMPARE = 15          
00245         , CONCAT = 16           
00246         , SHIFT = 17            
00247         , ADD_SUB = 18          
00248         , MUL_DIV = 19          
00249         , PREFIX = 20           
00250         , POSTFIX = 21          
00251         , DEFINITION = 22       
00252 };

00435         class STLVariables : public Variables {
00436                 public:         typedef std::map<const String, Value> VariableMap;
00437                 public:         typedef std::map<const String, Native* > NativeMap;
00438                 public:         virtual bool lookup(const String& symbol, Value& result);
00439                 public:         virtual bool assign(const String& symbol, const Value& value) { vars[symbol] = value; return true; }
00440                 public:         virtual bool erase(const String& symbol) { return (vars.erase(symbol) > 0); }
00441                 public:         virtual void list(const String& key, typename Variables::VarList& list);
00442                 public:         virtual Native* lookupNative(const String& name);
00443                 public:         virtual bool assignNative(const String& name, Native* native);
00444                 public:         virtual ~STLVariables();
00445                 public:         VariableMap vars;
00446                 public:         NativeMap natives;
00447         };

00459         class Native {
00460                 public:         virtual Value pikaCall(Frame& /*frame*/) { throw Xception(STR("Not callable")); }                                       
00461                 public:         virtual ~Native();
00462         };
00463 
00484         template<class F, class A0 = typename F::argument_type, class R = typename F::result_type> class UnaryFunctor
00485                         : public Native {
00486                 public:         UnaryFunctor(const F& functor) : func(functor) { }
00487                 protected:      template<class T> const Value arg(Frame& f, const T&) { return f.get(STR("$0")); }                                      
00488                 protected:      Frame& arg(Frame& f, const Dumb<Frame&>&) { return f; }                                                                                         
00489                 protected:      const Frame& arg(Frame& f, const Dumb<const Frame&>&) { return f; }                                                                     
00490                 protected:      template<class A, class T> Value call(A& a, const Dumb<T>&) { return func(a); }                                         
00491                 protected:      template<class A> Value call(A& a, const Dumb<void>&) { func(a); return Value(); }                                      
00492                 public:         virtual Value pikaCall(Frame& f) { return call(arg(f, Dumb<A0>()), Dumb<R>()); }
00493                 protected:      F func;
00494         };
00495         
00499         template<class F, class A0 = typename F::first_argument_type, class A1 = typename F::second_argument_type
00500                         , class R = typename F::result_type> class BinaryFunctor : public Native {
00501                 public:         BinaryFunctor(const F& functor) : func(functor) { }
00502                 protected:      template<class T> Value call(const Value& a0, const Value& a1, const T&) { return func(a0, a1); }       
00503                 protected:      Value call(const Value& a0, const Value& a1, const Dumb<void>&) { func(a0, a1); return Value(); }       
00504                 public:         virtual Value pikaCall(Frame& f) { return call(f.get(STR("$0")), f.get(STR("$1")), Dumb<R>()); }
00505                 protected:      F func;
00506         };
00507         
00508         template<class F> static UnaryFunctor<F>* newUnaryFunctor(const F& f) { return new UnaryFunctor<F>(f); }                        
00509         template<class F> static BinaryFunctor<F>* newBinaryFunctor(const F& f) { return new BinaryFunctor<F>(f); }
